1611277411_1GvDe5pkKGgM4ZXSge4CwhekmWCjp.body: Eat the black pill. Technology makes it easier and cheaper for the elites to manage the economy (and our lives) not harder. Despite the best work of things like Tor, Gab, and ZeroNet, the simple truth is that any fundamental social change has become impossible due to the mass surveillance state with a rapidly diminishing tolerance for dissent.
